hugo setup

sudo apt install hugo hugo version hugo new site newsitename

hugo new posts/first-post.md vim content/posts/first-post.md

hugo server git init git submodule add theme github clone themes/themename cp themes/dracula/exampleSite/* . -r change in config.toml themesDir, theme, baseurl

config.toml add publishDir = “docs” hugo

git remote add origin new github repo git add –all git commit -m “first-commit” git push origin master
